timeline.message:
Added maven configuration for DocService (#1)

Added protobuf-maven-plugin configuration needed to expose services documenation to DocService.

timeline.author: trustin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -175,6 +175,8 @@ For gRPC:
 - Configure the protobuf plugin to generate the ``.dsc`` file that contains the docstrings and
   put it into the ``META-INF/armeria/grpc`` directory:
 
+  Using gradle:

timeline.bodyText:
How about adding some comment block to the full manual of protobuf-maven-plugin? e.g.
<!-- See https://www.xolstice.org/protobuf-maven-plugin/usage.html for more information. -->
timeline.author: trustin

timeline.message:
Fix Gradle and Maven typo

Gradle and Maven are now capitalised.
Added protobuf-maven-plugin documentation link.
